name: Neighborhood Blackout
description:
WASD - Locomover-se

E - Interact

Shift - correr

Botão esquerdo do mouse - Liga a lanterna

Tente resolver os puzzles apertando "e" nos postes  que estiverem apagados, tente fugir do inimigo e resolver todos os puzzles :D

Deixe o seu comentário

Game by: Ítalo, Adler, com apoio dos professores Lucas e Vitor

WASD - Walk

E - Interact

Shift - run

Left mouse button - Turn on the flashlight

Try to solve the puzzles by pressing "e" on the posts that are out, try to escape from the enemy and solve all the puzzles :D

Leave your comment

Game by: Ítalo, Adler, with support from teachers Lucas and Vitor
